20110114190039.000|20110114190042.000|CC1|LESLIE: A FAMILY TRAGEDY IN SAN 
20110114190042.000|20110114190042.000|CC1|BERNARDINO.                     
20110114190042.000|20110114190045.000|CC1|A MAN, WIFE AND SON ARE ALL     
20110114190045.000|20110114190046.000|CC1|ELECTRICUTED AFTER POWER LINES  
20110114190046.000|20110114190049.000|CC1|FALL IN THEIR BACKYARD.         
20110114190049.000|20110114190050.000|CC1|I'M LESLIE SYKES.               
20110114190050.000|20110114190052.000|CC1|PHILLIP: AND I'M PHILLIP PALMER.
20110114190052.000|20110114190054.000|CC1|A FATHER GOES OUTSIDE EARLY     
20110114190054.000|20110114190055.000|CC1|THIS MORNING AFTER APPARENTLY   
20110114190055.000|20110114190056.000|CC1|HEARING AN EXPLOSION NEAR HIS   
20110114190056.000|20110114190059.000|CC1|BACKYARD AND THAT SET OFF A     
20110114190059.000|20110114190101.000|CC1|TERRIBLE CHAIN OF EVENTS THAT   
20110114190101.000|20110114190105.000|CC1|RESULTED IN THE DEATHS OF THREE 
20110114190105.000|20110114190105.000|CC1|PEOPLE.                         
20110114190105.000|20110114190106.000|CC1|IT HAPPENED ON ACACIA AVENUE.   
20110114190106.000|20110114190108.000|CC1|ROB MCMILLAN IS LIVE AT THE     
20110114190108.000|20110114190110.000|CC1|HOME WITH A CLOSER LOOK AT WHAT 
20110114190110.000|20110114190110.000|CC1|HAPPENED.                       
20110114190110.000|20110114190111.000|CC1|ROB?                            
20110114190111.000|20110114190113.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WELL, PHILLIP, SAN 
20110114190113.000|20110114190113.000|CC1|BERNARDINO POLICE DEPARTMENT    
20110114190113.000|20110114190114.000|CC1|SAYS IT WAS CAUSED BY HEAVY     
20110114190114.000|20110114190116.000|CC1|WINDS AND I DON'T KNOW IF YOU   
20110114190116.000|20110114190117.000|CC1|CAN TELL BUT IT'S STILL BREEZY  
20110114190117.000|20110114190122.000|CC1|IN THIS NEIGHBORHOOD RIGHT NOW. 
20110114190122.000|20110114190122.000|CC1|SOCAL EDISON IS INVESTIGATING   
20110114190122.000|20110114190124.000|CC1|WHAT HAPPENED BUT IT APPEARS    
20110114190124.000|20110114190125.000|CC1|THAT A 12,000 VOLT POWER LINE   
20110114190125.000|20110114190126.000|CC1|CAME DOWN IN THE BACKYARD OF    
20110114190126.000|20110114190128.000|CC1|ONE OF THESE HOMES AND THE      
20110114190128.000|20110114190130.000|CC1|TRAGEDY UNFOLDED FROM THERE.    
20110114190130.000|20110114190132.000|CC1|AS YOU CAN TELL, THE POLICE     
20110114190132.000|20110114190134.000|CC1|DEPARTMENT IS STILL DOWN THERE, 
20110114190134.000|20110114190135.000|CC1|SOCAL EDISON IS STILL DOWN      
20110114190135.000|20110114190135.000|CC1|THERE.                          
20110114190135.000|20110114190136.000|CC1|APPARENTLY IT WAS JUST BEFORE   
20110114190136.000|20110114190139.000|CC1|6:00 THIS MORNING WHEN IT ALL   
20110114190139.000|20110114190140.000|CC1|HAPPENED.                       
20110114190140.000|20110114190141.000|CC1|A FAMILY OF FIVE, THREE PEOPLE  
20110114190141.000|20110114190141.000|CC1|ARE DEAD.                       
20110114190141.000|20110114190143.000|CC1|NOW, I SPOKE WITH THE BROTHER   
20110114190143.000|20110114190145.000|CC1|OF ONE OF THE VICTIMS AND HE    
20110114190145.000|20110114190147.000|CC1|SAYS THAT IN HIS OPINION, THIS  
20110114190147.000|20110114190149.000|CC1|HAS HAPPENED BEFORE AND HE      
20110114190149.000|20110114190151.000|CC1|THINKS THIS COULD HAVE BEEN     
20110114190151.000|20110114190153.000|CC1|PREVENTED.                      
20110114190153.000|20110114190156.000|CC1|>> THIS IS THE SECOND TIME      
20110114190156.000|20110114190158.000|CC1|THOSE LINES HAVE FELL ON MY     
20110114190158.000|20110114190158.000|CC1|BROTHER'S HOUSE.                
20110114190158.000|20110114190200.000|CC1|THIS TIME HE KILLED MY          
20110114190200.000|20110114190200.000|CC1|BROTHER'S FAMILY AND HIM.       
20110114190200.000|20110114190203.000|CC1|I WOULD LIKE TO KNOW WHY THAT'S 
20110114190203.000|20110114190204.000|CC1|HAPPENING, WHY THE WIRES FELL   
20110114190204.000|20110114190206.000|CC1|AND KILLED MY FAMILY.           
20110114190206.000|20110114190208.000|CC1|>> FRANK VEGO SAYS HIS BROTHER, 
20110114190208.000|20110114190211.000|CC1|HIS WIFE SHARON AND THEIR SON   
20110114190211.000|20110114190213.000|CC1|JONATHAN COLE WERE ALL KILLED   
20110114190213.000|20110114190214.000|CC1|THIS MORNING.                   
20110114190214.000|20110114190216.000|CC1|POLICE ARE STILL INVESTIGATING  
20110114190216.000|20110114190216.000|CC1|WHAT HAPPENED.                  
20110114190216.000|20110114190218.000|CC1|THE THOUGHT IS THAT SOMEHOW THE 
20110114190218.000|20110114190221.000|CC1|WIND CAUSED POWER LINES TO FALL 
20110114190221.000|20110114190222.000|CC1|IN THE BACKYARD.                
20110114190222.000|20110114190224.000|CC1|FRANK SAYS IT SPARKED A FIRE.   
20110114190224.000|20110114190225.000|CC1|>> THAT'S THE ONLY REASON HE    
20110114190225.000|20110114190226.000|CC1|WAS BACK THERE WAS BECAUSE OF   
20110114190226.000|20110114190227.000|CC1|THE FIRE.

20110114190229.000|20110114190230.000|CC1|CONTROL.

20110114190230.000|20110114190232.000|CC1|LINE THAT WAS DOWN AND HE

20110114190236.000|20110114190236.000|CC1|FROM THERE.

20110114190239.000|20110114190241.000|CC1|HIM AND IT WAS A DOMINO EFFECT

20110114190246.000|20110114190248.000|CC1|THE HOME AND THEY SURVIVED.

20110114190630.000|20110114190631.000|CC1|WEDNESDAY.                      
20110114190631.000|20110114190633.000|CC1|JOINING ME IS THE POLICE CHIEF  
20110114190633.000|20110114190634.000|CC1|WITH CAMPUS POLICE TO EXPLAIN A 
20110114190634.000|20110114190636.000|CC1|LITTLE MORE ABOUT THE ARREST.   
20110114190636.000|20110114190636.000|CC1|TAKE ME THROUGH THAT.           
20110114190636.000|20110114190639.000|CC1|HE WAS ARRESTED ON WEDNESDAY.   
20110114190639.000|20110114190640.000|CC1|WAS THAT ON CAMPUS?             
20110114190640.000|20110114190644.000|CC1|>> NO.                          
20110114190644.000|20110114190646.000|CC1|THAT WAS NOT ON CAMPUS THAT WE  
20110114190646.000|20110114190647.000|CC1|ARRESTED HIM.                   
20110114190647.000|20110114190649.000|CC1|THIS YOUNG MAN WAS IN A         
20110114190649.000|20110114190650.000|CC1|COUNSELING SESSION WITH OUR     
20110114190650.000|20110114190651.000|CC1|PROFESSIONAL STAFF OF           
20110114190651.000|20110114190652.000|CC1|COUNSELORS ON CAMPUS.           
20110114190652.000|20110114190654.000|CC1|HE HAD HAD SOME ISSUES THAT HE  
20110114190654.000|20110114190655.000|CC1|WAS REFERRED BY OUR RESIDENTIAL 
20110114190655.000|20110114190657.000|CC1|LIFE STAFF TO THE COUNSELING    
20110114190657.000|20110114190658.000|CC1|STAFF AND IT BECAME APPARENT    
20110114190658.000|20110114190700.000|CC1|THAT HE WAS CLEARLY A DANGER TO 
20110114190700.000|20110114190701.000|CC1|HIMSELF AND OTHERS.             
20110114190701.000|20110114190704.000|CC1|AT THAT TIME UNIVERSITY POLICE  
20110114190704.000|20110114190704.000|CC1|WERE NOTIFIED.                  
20110114190704.000|20110114190707.000|CC1|WE RESPONDED AND MADE AN        
20110114190707.000|20110114190709.000|CC1|ASSESSMENT OF THE SITUATION AND 
20110114190709.000|20110114190711.000|CC1|DETERMINED THAT INDEED HE       
20110114190711.000|20110114190713.000|CC1|NEEDED MENTAL HEALTH ASSISTANCE.
20110114190713.000|20110114190716.000|CC1|SO HE'S KNOWN AS A 5150 MENTAL  
20110114190716.000|20110114190718.000|CC1|HEALTH HOLD AT THE TIME AND     
20110114190718.000|20110114190720.000|CC1|CONVEYED TO A MENTAL HEALTH     
20110114190720.000|20110114190721.000|CC1|FACILITY.                       
20110114190721.000|20110114190721.000|CC1|AT THE SAME TIME WE BECAME      
20110114190721.000|20110114190724.000|CC1|AWARE THAT HE HAD A FIREARM IN  
20110114190724.000|20110114190726.000|CC1|HIS DORMITORY ROOM AND WE       
20110114190726.000|20110114190728.000|CC1|SIMULTANEOUSLY WENT TO SEIZE    
20110114190728.000|20110114190730.000|CC1|THAT WEAPON AND A COUPLE OF     
20110114190730.000|20110114190734.000|CC1|DAYS LATER, UPON A SEARCH       
20110114190734.000|20110114190735.000|CC1|WARRANT, WE ALSO SAW BOMB       
20110114190735.000|20110114190736.000|CC1|MAKING MATERIALS IN THE SAME    
20110114190736.000|20110114190737.000|CC1|ROOM.                           
20110114190737.000|20110114190737.000|CC1|A SEARCH WAS CONDUCTED OF THE   
20110114190737.000|20110114190738.000|CC1|ROOM AT THAT TIME.
